mapper.select: select ord.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS rnum, o.* from (select @ROWNUM:=0) AS r, (select * from order_tb order by order_date desc) o) ord where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}

select p.PRODUCT_CODE, p.CATEGORY_CODE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, o.order_de_amount, i.product_img_name, i.PRODUCT_IMG_ORIGINAL_NAME from product p, order_detail o, product_img i, category c where p.product_code = o.product_code and o.order_id = #{order_id} and p.PRODUCT_CODE = i.PRODUCT_CODE and p.CATEGORY_CODE = c.CATEGORY_CODE and i.PRODUCT_IMG_TYPE = 1;

select c.cart_num, c.product_code, c.user_id, c.order_de_amount, ct.category_name, p.product_name, p.product_price, i.product_img_name from cart c, product p, category ct, product_img i where user_id = #{user_id} and c.product_code = p.product_code and p.category_code = ct.category_code and p.product_code = i.product_code and i.product_img_type = 1 and cart_num in
#{cartNum}
mapper.insert: insert into order_tb (order_id, user_id, order_name, user_address1, user_address2, user_address3, order_phone, order_totalprice) values(#{order_id}, #{user_id}, #{order_name}, #{user_address1}, #{user_address2}, #{user_address3}, #{order_phone}, #{order_totalprice})

insert into order_detail (order_id, product_code, order_de_amount) select #{orderDto.order_id}, product_code, order_de_amount from cart where cart_num in
#{cart}
